subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Bulls Coach Vinny Del Negro, in his first year, was skewered in Chicago after Games 1 and 2 for leaving the Bulls without timeouts in the waning seconds against the Celtics.
snippet: Bulls Coach Vinny Del Negro, in his first year, was skewered in Chicago after Games 1 and 2 for leaving the Bulls without timeouts in the waning seconds against the Celtics.
